item.title: WATCH: Animals predicting the Super Bowl
item.description: A tree kangaroo at the Roger Williams Zoo in Rhode Island picked the Patriots, while Puerto Rican crested toads in Texas and a tarantula at Brookfield...

item.title: WATCH: Big moments as Olympics begin
item.description: Team USA, with more than 200 athletes, is the largest U.S. Olympic team ever, representing 32 states and chasing gold in Milan.

item.title: Authorities 'aware of new message regarding Nancy Guthrie': Sheriff
item.description: The FBI and the Pima County Sheriff's Department area "aware of a new message regarding Nancy Guthrie," the sheriff's office said Friday.

item.title: Trump says he didn't see full racist video, says he won't apologize
item.description: President Trump shared a video that included a racist animation of Barack and Michelle Obama, prompting backlash and the White House to later take it ...

item.title: WATCH: White House deletes racist video of the Obamas shared by President Trump
item.description: After bipartisan backlash, the White House has taken down a racist video of the Obamas that was shared by President Trump.
